article_title: Mike Coffman congratulates Valor Christian football
article_text:

Meet the Bloggers

Follow @neildevlin High School Sports Editor

Neil Devlin, originally from the Philadelphia area, has covered high school sports in Colorado for more than 30 years, writing about the people, athletes and events that encompass the Rocky Mountain prep sports world.

Follow @morgandzak Digital Prep Sports Producer

Morgan Dzakowic has been a sports producer for The Denver Post since 2015. She has a degree in convergence journalism from Missouri. It is not framed.

og.description: Colorado Rep. Mike Coffman recognized Valor Christian's football team on the U.S. House Floor after the Eagles claimed a sixth state championship.
og.title: Mike Coffman congratulates Valor Christian football

twitter.description: Colorado Rep. Mike Coffman recognized Valor Christian's football team on the U.S. House Floor after the Eagles claimed a sixth state championship.
twitter.title: WATCH: Congressman Mike Coffman congratulates Valor Christian football on state championship
